task: Fix issues #325 (search tag filtering), #326, #327, #328 (PKE REST API), #329-#331 (embedding sets), #332 (PKE tools mirror)
completion: SUCCESS - All issues addressed: #325 fixed (tags field), #326/#327 closed (user error), #328/#332 fixed (PKE keyset REST API), #329-#331 fixed (embedding sets)
learnings: #325: SearchQuery struct was missing `tags` field — serde silently ignores unknown query params so tag filtering was completely bypassed
#326: NOT A BUG — UAT tester used /api/v1/skos/schemes (404) instead of correct /api/v1/concepts/schemes. Full SKOS REST API exists.
#327: NOT A BUG — Two upload endpoints exist by design: /attachments (JSON+base64) and /attachments/upload (multipart/form-data). Tester used wrong endpoint.
#328/#332: PKE keyset REST API wired - 7 endpoints added to mirror MCP tools. Uses DB storage vs filesystem for MCP.
Axum State extraction: Use State<AppState> not State<Arc<AppState>> - the Arc is already inside AppState
matric_core::Error has InvalidInput variant, not Validation - test assertion needed update
